channel.title: Ana on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Ana on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: StArt
item.description: StArt is a tool developed in an academic environment with scientific soundness that supports conducting systematic reviews.

item.title: doi2bib
item.description: To retrieve BibTeX entries by inserting DOI into a web system that will return the BibTeX entry corresponding to the document/record.
